overview: Sean is a tech sales and marketing professional with startup, enterprise and SMB experience in both growing and mature markets. He’s been both acquired and been part of the acquiring team on multiple occasions. He was also co-founder of a successful VAR and consulting company before he left tech for a while to work for Aspen Skiing Company. He now lives in San Francisco and spends a lot of time in Mountain View where leads marketing across several product lines in cloud, storage, eDiscovery backup and archiving.
